Class Corpus

java.lang.Object

      de.unifrankfurt.texttechnologie.olympia.Corpus
All Implemented Interfaces:
CorpusAPI, java.lang.Runnable
public class Corpus
extends java.lang.Thread
implements CorpusAPI

Parses page related information into article objects.

Author:
Benjamin Bronder, Timo Homburg

                        Artikel article,
                        java.lang.String path)
Analyses an article page and gets the provided attributes.

Specified by:
readPage in interface CorpusAPI
Parameters:
